text:
you win, you can bring a car full of friends—and eventually we’re cleared for takeoff. Once
inside we lose each other in the darkness and pulsating Caribbean music. | get home at
5:00am, pack my three huge suitcases and rush off to the private airport in Van Nuys, still
wondering how | could have missed “Moonlight”’s triumph. Why couldn't | see the forest
through the trees? | must have been in La La-land.

XOXO,
Peggy

P.S. The following weekend | arrive in the Dominican Republic at Casa de Campo at the home
of sugar baron Pepe Fanjul and his wife Emilia. Juan Carlos, the past king of Spain, wants to
watch a few movies with me. | pulled a dozen DVDs out of my bag and say, "Your Majesty,
which one"? He says, "First, "La La Land" for fun, then "Moonlight" because it won, then "The
Founder" for American ingenuity.”

HOUSE_OVERSIGHT_019855
